sections.heading: assessments; determination of amounts
sections.text: All special assessments to cover the cost of any public improvements authorized by sections 14-101 to 14-2004 shall be levied and assessed on all lots, parts of lots, lands, and real estate specially benefited by such improvement, or within the improvement distr

sections.heading: not unconstitutional as authorizing levy of the full cost of improvement according to front foot rule without regard to special benefits
sections.text: Murphy v. Metropolitan Utilities Dist., 126 Neb. 663, 255 N.W. 20 (1934).
